required.name: claude-flow
required.command: claude mcp add claude-flow npx claude-flow@alpha mcp start
required.purpose: Core swarm coordination, SPARC workflows, agent orchestration

optional.name: ruv-swarm
optional.command: claude mcp add ruv-swarm npx ruv-swarm mcp start
optional.purpose: Enhanced swarm coordination and multi-agent workflows

optional.name: flow-nexus
optional.command: claude mcp add flow-nexus npx flow-nexus@latest mcp start
optional.purpose: Cloud-based sandboxes, neural AI, templates, GitHub integration (70+ tools)

optional.name: beads
optional.purpose: Lightweight issue tracking and project management

optional.name: deep-research
optional.purpose: Advanced web research using Tavily Search and Crawl
optional.documentation: Check package registry for installation details

optional.name: ide
optional.purpose: VS Code language diagnostics and Jupyter code execution

notes: claude-flow is REQUIRED for core orchestration
All other servers are optional based on needs
flow-nexus requires account registration at flow-nexus.ruv.io
beads requires initialization per project with 'bd init'
MCP servers can be added/removed at any time with 'claude mcp add/remove'
Some MCP servers may require Node.js and npm installed
